article: ferrexpo had its price target raised by stock analysts at credit suisse group from gbx 247.64 to gbx 340 in a report issued on wednesday . the brokerage presently has a `` neutral '' rating on the iron ore producer 's stock . credit suisse group 's price target would suggest a potential upside of 9.61 % from the stock 's previous close . several other research firms have also commented on fxpo . barclays reissued an `` underweight '' rating and issued a gbx 215 price target on shares of ferrexpo in a research report on monday , january 8th .

deutsche bank lowered ferrexpo to a `` hold '' rating and upped their target price for the company from gbx 270 to gbx 280 in a research report on friday , october 6th . liberum capital reiterated a `` sell '' rating and set a gbx 130 price target on shares of ferrexpo in a research note on monday , october 30th . finally , jpmorgan chase & co. . dropped their price target on ferrexpo from gbx 190 to gbx 175 and set a `` neutral '' rating on the stock in a research note on friday , october 6th .

two research analysts have rated the stock with a sell rating and four have issued a hold rating to the company 's stock . the company currently has an average rating of `` hold '' and an average target price of gbx 238.33 . ferrexpo traded up gbx 0.30 on wednesday , hitting gbx 310.20 . the stock had a trading volume of 2,180,000 shares , compared to its average volume of 1,960,000 . the company has a market cap of $ 1,830.00 and a price-to-earnings ratio of 775.50 . ferrexpo has a 52-week low of gbx 122.97 and a 52-week high of gbx 326.60 .

trademark violation warning : `` ferrexpo pt raised to gbx 340 '' was first published by daily political and is the property of of daily political . if you are accessing this article on another site , it was copied illegally and republished in violation of u. s. and international trademark and copyright law . the correct version of this article can be viewed at company profileferrexpo plc is an iron ore pellet producer . the company produces , develops and markets its principal product , iron ore pellets , for sale to the metallurgical industry . the company 's operations are vertically integrated from iron ore mining through to iron ore concentrate , and pellet production and subsequent logistics .
